item.description:
Note: This same event will be offered on Friday, April 26th, at Roots and Wings in Natick.

This evening we’ll experientially explore the grand question of “Who am I?”. Are you just a small, limited, physical being separate from everyone and everything else?

It’s so easy to slip into feeling that way, regardless of your beliefs, isn’t it?

Through a combination of instruction, discussion and easy guided meditations, Ann will help you to connect to your sense of Spirit, to feel like you’re “so much more”, and to open you up to delightful new possibilities.

You’ll leave feeling fully relaxed, fully loved, and with an expanded sense of who you are and what you’re capable of.

So treat yourself to this wonderful free event for you. Please invite others to sign up and join you. Share this with your friends, family and groups. This is a public event appropriate for everyone, and all are welcome!  We are sharing it with you because of its relevance to law of attraction and being a powerful, deliberate creator.

“This event was phenomenal. Truly outstanding. I am SO glad I went. I left with a bunch of exciting, easy-to-apply tools for feeling better in any situation. Thanks, Ann!” Julia

Space is limited, so registration is required.  In the past we have turned people on waiting lists away because of sign-up reaching capacity for the space, and then people didn't show up without notifying us. PLEASE, if you RSVP "yes", be considerate, and either show up, or let us know of your change in plans in a timely manner. (You can either change your RSVP or e-mail Ann.)

“I generally struggle with being in a quiet space and being present; but tonight’s class helped me channel positive energy and feel good about who I am.” Michele G.

 

Class leader: Ann Ide, M.A., www.newpossibilitiescoaching.com, certified master practitioner in Neuro-linguistic Programming and Hypnotherapy, and certified NLP Life Coach. Ann coaches people to move beyond struggles and mere survival, to new levels of harmony, happiness and success. With her expert questioning, inner exploration processes and personal change interventions, clients become emotionally and spiritually aligned to more easily create the happiness they want.

This event is co-sponsored by Earthsong Yoga and New Possibilities Coaching as a community service.

www.earthsongyoga.com

www.newpossibilitiescoaching.com
item.how_to_find_us: It's the big, old Corey building, only sign is on sidewalk. Studio is upstairs, in room 14. Easy parking

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Who Am I? April’s FREE Community Evening of Guided Meditations
